docs.snippet: Rex Ryan again declined to discuss details of Saturday’s passionate speech to his Jets team, or confirm whether it was provoked by a sense he may fired as the team’s coach....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rex Ryan again declined to discuss details of Saturday’s passionate speech to his Jets team, or confirm whether it was provoked by a sense he may fired as the team’s coach.
docs.abstract: New York Jets coach Rex Ryan is in limbo and has been for the last 11 months; he is expected to learn whether he will be retained for 2014 after last game of season.

headline.main: Jets’ Ryan Looks Ahead, but Not Past Finale
headline.print_headline: Ryan Looks Ahead, But Not Past Finale

docs.snippet: Will Hill’s game-tying 38-yard interception return for a touchdown off a deflected pass late in regulation was a key play in the Giants’ overtime victory over the Lions....
docs.lead_paragraph: Will Hill’s game-tying 38-yard interception return for a touchdown off a deflected pass late in regulation was a key play in the Giants’ overtime victory over the Lions.
docs.abstract: Safety Will Hill’s game-tying 38-yard interception return for a touchdown off a deflected pass late in regulation was a key play in New York Giants’ overtime victory over Detroit Lions; among the Giants, Hill is viewed as a talented player who has struggled to overcome a difficult childhood in a rough section of East Orange, NJ.

headline.main: Key Return for Giant Trying to Take Positive Steps

docs.snippet: Candlestick Park, home to the San Francisco 49ers and at one time the Giants, will be torn down. “It was a dump,” said a former 49ers wide receiver. “But it was our dump.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: Candlestick Park, home to the San Francisco 49ers and at one time the Giants, will be torn down. “It was a dump,” said a former 49ers wide receiver. “But it was our dump.”
docs.abstract: Nostalgia creeps over Candlestick Park like summer fog as San Francisco 49ers play what is quite possibly the final game at a stadium that few ever loved; San Francisco clinches playoff berth with 34-24 victory over Atlanta Falcons; Candlestick Park had a unique way of becoming a character in its own dramas and will be torn down as 49ers move to new Levi’s Stadium in Santa Clara.

headline.main: Stadium Fades From a Spotlight It Used to Steal
headline.print_headline: Candlestick Park Fades From a Spotlight It Made a Habit of Stealing

docs.snippet: KARR--Christy, 93, of Agawam, MA died December 19, 2013. He was married to the love of his life, Elizabeth Flanagan. Known as "Dear Old Dad" by his children, Christy Jr. (wife Peggy), Richard (wife Ellen) and Elizabeth (Liz) Rodbell (husband Mitch...
docs.lead_paragraph: KARR--Christy, 93, of Agawam, MA died December 19, 2013. He was married to the love of his life, Elizabeth Flanagan. Known as "Dear Old Dad" by his children, Christy Jr. (wife Peggy), Richard (wife Ellen) and Elizabeth (Liz) Rodbell (husband Mitchell). Loved by his grandchildren, Danielle, Joanna, Emily, Ryan, Hannah, Sarah and Luca his great-grandchild. He graduated Brown University and served in WWII as a Navy Lieutenant. His career included management positions in the steel industry and then was President of AAIM a consulting firm until he retired at 84. He loved football, music and politics but most of all his family. Funeral services will be held in Brockton, MA on Saturday. A Memorial service will be held at Liz Rodbell's home in NYC on January 9th at 6:00pm. For full obituary, visit www.Russellpicafuneralhome.com
